column5: If I recall correctly, you are allowed one carton of smokes (tax free) across border. If one is inclined to take Skoal/Copenhagen instead, how much can they take? Very busy today, so if this topic has been discussed, sorry for the repeat. Thanks
I'm pretty sure you can take up to 7 oz smokeless tobacco into Canada. Cans of Cope weigh 1.2 oz. I'll be taking 5 cans across the border tomorrow.
